title: Stage Lv3-P1-S05
description: Level 3 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I had been waiting for two hours when he came. (variant 1)
They had been living there for ten years. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 3 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 그가 올 때까지 2시간 동안 기다리고 있었어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: I had been waiting for two hours when he came. (variant 1)
They had been living there for ten years. (variant 1)
I had been preparing for an hour before the meeting. (variant 1)
How long had you been studying English? (variant 1)
It had been raining since morning. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그녀는 3년 동안 그 회사에서 일하고 있었어요. (확장 1)
sentences.en: She had been working at that company for three years. (variant 1)
We had been meeting until lunch time. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 그들은 왜 그렇게 오래 기다리고 있었나요? (확장 1)
sentences.en: Why had they been waiting so long? (variant 1)
He had been exercising since morning. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 우리는 1주일 동안 그 문제를 논의하고 있었습니다. (확장 1)
sentences.en: We had been discussing the issue for a week. (variant 1)
